metadata.title: CVE-2023-52425 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: libexpat through 2.5.0 allows a denial of service (resource consumption)because many full reparsings are required in the case of a large token forwhich multiple buffer fills are needed.

criterions.comment: expat package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
xmlrpc-c package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
